stickers.name: mostima_precious
stickers.alt: Mostima's eyes shine excitedly as she is presented with a box of donuts by a pair of disembodied hands. A heavenly light is emitted from the donuts in the box, making the air around Mostima sparkle.

stickers.name: breeze_floof
stickers.alt: Breeze grins as she affectionately pets a fox. Alongside them are the words 'mofu mofu' that indicate the fox is very soft and fluffy to the touch.

stickers.name: bison_note
stickers.alt: Bison takes notes with a clipboard, a pen, and a deadpan expression.

stickers.name: may_untitledduck
stickers.alt: May stands dumbfounded, scratching her head as she looking for her gun. Behind her is a duck with May's gun in its mouth, waddling away from May. This sticker is drawn in a different art style to the rest of the sticker pack, instead emulating the art style of the game 'Untitled Goose Game.'

stickers.name: ethan_trick
stickers.alt: Ethan grins as he does a trick with his yo-yo, creating an image with the yo-yo's string.

stickers.name: waaifu_annoyed
stickers.alt: Waai Fu seems irritated and disheveled as she uses her claws to scratch something.

stickers.name: mostima_offer
stickers.alt: Mostima grins as she holds out and offering of sausages to someone. Only the other person's hand is visible, shown to be gesturing a polite decline of Mostima's offer. The two sausages she's offering are skewered onto the tip of the ancient, dangerous staff, the Black Lock.

stickers.name: waaifu_think
stickers.alt: Waai Fu is pondering with her right hand under her chin, and her left arm resting along the bottom of the image as if it were a table.

stickers.name: ethan_fail
stickers.alt: Ethan lies facedown on the ground. He's tied up by his own yo-yo, his arms pinned to his sides. The word 'fail' appears above him in both Chinese and English.

stickers.name: may_drown
stickers.alt: May splashing around in water with a panicked expression. Although it gives the impression that she's drowning, it's important to note that she only seems to be waist-deep in water, and that actual drowning is much quieter.

stickers.name: siege_angry
stickers.alt: Siege holds her hammer in her right hand as she stands over the limp body of the Doctor. The Doctor's head has been smashed into the wall, leaving a sizable hole that their head currently rests in. Based on Siege's anger, they probably upset Siege somehow.

stickers.name: warfarin_sleep
stickers.alt: Warfarin is asleep, wearing a sleep mask and cuddling a bat plushie that looks like her. Of course, as a vampire, she's also hanging upside down.

stickers.name: nightingale_tweet
stickers.alt: Nightingale is on her phone with her back to the viewer. A small icon above her head indicates that she is using the Terra equivalent of Twitter.

stickers.name: firewatch_button
stickers.alt: Firewatch stands before a button with a deadpan expression. The lid on the button is labelled 'DANGER' and has been removed out of the way. The button makes a sound as Firewatch's finger presses down on it.

stickers.name: kroos_quiet
stickers.alt: Kroos is about to say her famous line 'kokodayo~!' but it cut off by the Doctor slapping a hand over her mouth. As a result, she is only able to get the first 'ko-' out before she opens her eyes in surprise.

stickers.name: rope_huh
stickers.alt: Rope is confused as she holds up her hook, finding a torn tentacle pierced on one of the claws.

stickers.name: breeze_floof_en
stickers.alt: Breeze grins as she affectionately pets a fox. Alongside them is the word 'Floofing' that indicates the fox is fluffy.

stickers.name: ethan_fail_en
stickers.alt: Ethan lies facedown on the ground. He's tied up by his own yo-yo, his arms pinned to his sides. The word 'failed' appears above him.

stickers.name: firewatch_button_en
stickers.alt: Firewatch stands before a button with a deadpan expression. The lid on the button is labelled 'DANGER' and has been removed out of the way. The button beeps as Firewatch's finger presses down on it.
